message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,400,000. It's a great deal for you, considering its value to you is $1,200,000. Let me know your thoughts.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1,350,000, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not quite there yet.  I'm willing to come down a bit more, but $1,300,000 is my absolute bottom line.  This still gives you a great deal, as it's significantly less than what the product is worth to you. Let me know if you're willing to meet me there.

I appreciate your willingness to come down, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1,250,000, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that. I'm starting to think about buying from John, though...
